commands.name: az postgres flexible-server long-term-retention list
commands.summary: List all the long-term-retention backups for a given server.
examples: az postgres flexible-server long-term-retention list -g resource-group-name -n server-name

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server long-term-retention pre-check
commands.summary: Performs all the checks that are needed for the subsequent long-term-retention backup operation to succeed.
examples: az postgres flexible-server long-term-retention pre-check -g resource-group-name -b backup-name -n server-name

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server long-term-retention show
commands.summary: Show the details of a specific long-term-retention backup for a given server.
examples: az postgres flexible-server long-term-retention show -g resource-group-name -n server-name -b backup-name

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server long-term-retention start
commands.summary: Start long-term-retention backup for a flexible server. SAS URL parameter refers to the container SAS URL, inside the storage account, where the backups will be uploaded.
examples: az postgres flexible-server long-term-retention start -g resource-group-name -b backup-name -n server-name -u <sas-url>
